short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add wind, shakers and motion to any youtube video using the Sim Racing Studio platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch videos in 4D!!!

This extension combined with Sim Racing Studio software and telemetry data files allow users to watch select YouTube videos in sync with their supported motion platform, shake hardware and wind simulators. Visit www.simracingstudio.com for more details.
